name: Firefox 5 - Download Manager UI Tweaks
description: Changes the background of the download manager along with some text and transparency changes.
additional_info:
*** To change the background image ***
You can use any size image but smaller images load faster

1.) upload the image you want as the background to an image hosting site
2.) copy the link of said image and replace it with the marked text in the stylesheet
3.) save, close, and enjoy

*** Version History ***
5/3/11: Initial release
5/6/11: fixed a bug with the selected download when the window is unfocused, changed text color, and selected item opacity
